(26438, 29251).description: The microwave radiation emitted by the Earth's surface, which is affected by land surface properties and used in satellite precipitation estimates

(26438, 29251).name: elevation
(26438, 29251).label: variable
(26438, 29251).description: The height of an area above sea level, which impacts the accuracy and reliability of satellite observations

(26438, 29251).name: gauge data
(26438, 29251).label: dataset
(26438, 29251).description: Ground-based measurements of precipitation, used as a reference for evaluating satellite observations

(28855, 31395).name: TMPA
(28855, 31395).label: project
(28855, 31395).description: The Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission (TRMM) Multi-satellite Precipitation Analysis, a project that provides precipitation data by combining multiple satellite estimates>

(28855, 31395).name: NASA
(28855, 31395).label: provider
(28855, 31395).description: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration, an American agency responsible for the nation's civilian space program and for aeronautics and space research>

(28855, 31395).name: GPM
(28855, 31395).label: project
(28855, 31395).description: The Global Precipitation Measurement mission, an international satellite mission that aims to provide global precipitation measurements>

(28855, 31395).name: Morocco
(28855, 31395).label: location
(28855, 31395).description: A country in the Maghreb region of North Africa, known for its diverse climate and geography>

(28855, 31395).name: University of Georgia
(28855, 31395).label: provider
(28855, 31395).description: A public research university located in the state of Georgia, United States, with a strong focus on research and academic programs>

(28855, 31395).name: Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center
(28855, 31395).label: provider
(28855, 31395).description: A data center that archives and distributes data from NASA's Earth science missions, including climate and weather data>

(28855, 31395).name: precipitation gauge data
(28855, 31395).label: variable
(28855, 31395).description: Data collected from precipitation gauges, used to measure rainfall and other forms of precipitation>

(28855, 31395).name: high-altitude environments
(28855, 31395).label: location
(28855, 31395).description: Regions on Earth with high elevations, often characterized by unique climate and geography>

(28855, 31395).name: arid environments
(28855, 31395).label: location
(28855, 31395).description: Regions on Earth with low rainfall and high evaporation rates, often characterized by desert or semi-desert conditions>
